attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ask the Queen to dissolve parliament. 

Given the disgraceful behaviour of many MPs and the subsequent lack of trust that we the people have in our elected politicians, it is time now to clear the rot that resides in parliament by way of a general election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
